languages.text: "Булыжник, псифокус — это просто безвольный камень, инструмент, прям как ты. Ну и что, что один раз какой-то псих использовал его для всякого безумия? Во благо его ведь тоже можно употребить!"
"Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"
languages.original_text: "Булыжник, псифокус — это просто безвольный камень, инструмент, прям как ты. Ну и что, что один раз какой-то псих использовал его для всякого безумия? Во благо его ведь тоже можно употребить!"

"Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"

languages.text: “你可真是个扫兴的家伙。灵能媒介仅仅是媒介而已，它没有自己的意志，仅仅是工具而已，就像你一样。就算真的有疯子打算用这些东西来实现疯狂的目的，那又如何？它也同样可以用来做好事！”
languages.original_text: "Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"

traits.locale_text: “你可真是个扫兴的家伙。灵能媒介仅仅是媒介而已，它没有自己的意志，仅仅是工具而已，就像你一样。就算真的有疯子打算用这些东西来实现疯狂的目的，那又如何？它也同样可以用来做好事！”

languages.text: 「水を差す天才、超能力集中はそれ自体が意志を持たないただの石よ。道具なの。あなたのようにね。だから、気の狂った終わりのために一部の狂人がそれをもう一度使うっていうのはどう？同じようにいい目的を果たすだけの可能性もある！」
languages.original_text: "Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"

traits.locale_text: 「水を差す天才、超能力集中はそれ自体が意志を持たないただの石よ。道具なの。あなたのようにね。だから、気の狂った終わりのために一部の狂人がそれをもう一度使うっていうのはどう？同じようにいい目的を果たすだけの可能性もある！」

languages.text: «Maese aguafiestas, un foco psíquico no es más que una piedra sin voluntad propia. Una herramienta, igual que usted. ¿Y qué si un lunático lo utilizó para cometer alguna fechoría? ¡Podría servir igualmente para un buen propósito!».
languages.original_text: "Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"

traits.locale_text: «Maese aguafiestas, un foco psíquico no es más que una piedra sin voluntad propia. Una herramienta, igual que usted. ¿Y qué si un lunático lo utilizó para cometer alguna fechoría? ¡Podría servir igualmente para un buen propósito!».

languages.text: "Oyunbozan Efendi... Ruhsezi odağı dediğimiz, iradesi olmayan bir taştan ibarettir. Tıpkı senin gibi bir araçtır. Ne olmuş yani bir zamanlar delinin teki onu sapkın amaçları için kullandıysa? Aynı şekilde iyi bir amaca da hizmet edebilir!"
languages.original_text: "Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"

traits.locale_text: "Oyunbozan Efendi... Ruhsezi odağı dediğimiz, iradesi olmayan bir taştan ibarettir. Tıpkı senin gibi bir araçtır. Ne olmuş yani bir zamanlar delinin teki onu sapkın amaçları için kullandıysa? Aynı şekilde iyi bir amaca da hizmet edebilir!"

languages.text: « Maître Rabat-joie, un concentrateur psychique n'est qu'un caillou sans volonté propre. Un outil. Comme vous. Il peut aussi bien être utilisé par un fou au service de ses desseins déments que servir une juste cause ! »
languages.original_text: "Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"

traits.locale_text: « Maître Rabat-joie, un concentrateur psychique n'est qu'un caillou sans volonté propre. Un outil. Comme vous. Il peut aussi bien être utilisé par un fou au service de ses desseins déments que servir une juste cause ! »

languages.text: "Meister Spielverderber, ein Psi-Fokus ist wie ein Stein ohne eigenen Willen. Ein Werkzeug. Genau wie Ihr. Dann benutzt es eben irgendein Irrer für seine kranken Zwecke. Es kann aber genauso gut dem Guten dienen!"
languages.original_text: "Master Killjoy, a psy-focus is just a rock without a will of its own. A tool. Like you. So what if some lunatic once used it for their deranged ends? It can just as equally serve a good purpose!"
